original_title: P.S. Don’t Go In the Cellar
overview: When Katie leaves for a trip, her friend, Leslie, has to leave. For the convenience, she leaves Katie with the house. As Katie stays there. She finds many mysterious things. She will have to escape in time… or else the creature will get her.
tagline: THE CREATURE LIVES WITHIN ITS BOUNDARIES
title: P.S. Don’t Go In the Cellar
